articles.content: In the thrilling world of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2024, it's not just the cricketers who catch the public's eye. Among the roaring crowds and the action-packed matches of the Sunrisers Hydera… [+1940 chars]

articles.title: Sumit Nagal vs Holger Rune Live Updates, Monte Carlo Masters 2024: Play suspended due to rain, to resume on Thursday - Khel Now
articles.description: Sumit Nagal vs Holger Rune Live: In one of the biggest match of his career, Nagal takes on the seventh-seeded Danish star. Follow the Monte Carlo Masters 2024 second round match live here.
